Operation 'get_/orders' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic ('List orders'). Description lacks detail about parameters, pagination mechanism, and response structure. Enhanced version clarifies pagination support, domain context (forest/paper supply chain), and explicitly mentions the ListOfOrders response schema for better AI agent understanding of available data and navigation options.

data.current_description: Gets a paginated list of all `orders`.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of all orders in the forest and paper supply chain. Supports filtering and pagination parameters to control result set size and offset. Returns a ListOfOrders object containing order headers and pagination links for navigation through results.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic ('List orders'). Description lacks detail about parameters, pagination mechanism, and response structure. Enhanced version clarifies pagination support, domain context (forest/paper supply chain), and explicitly mentions the ListOfOrders response schema for better AI agent understanding of available data and navigation options.

message: Operation 'get_/orders/{orderId}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Original summary is too vague ('Get an order'). Description mentions line items but lacks clarity about response structure and schema names. Enhanced version specifies the orderId parameter requirement, explicitly names the response schemas (OrderHeader and OrderLineItem), clarifies pagination support for line items, and provides better context for AI agents to understand the complete response structure and when to use pagination for line item retrieval.

data.current_description: Gets the details of a specific `order`, including a paginated list of all its lines.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve order details with line items
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves complete details of a specific order identified by orderId, including the OrderHeader information and a paginated list of all OrderLineItem entries associated with the order. Returns order header details and line items with pagination support for managing large orders.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too vague ('Get an order'). Description mentions line items but lacks clarity about response structure and schema names. Enhanced version specifies the orderId parameter requirement, explicitly names the response schemas (OrderHeader and OrderLineItem), clarifies pagination support for line items, and provides better context for AI agents to understand the complete response structure and when to use pagination for line item retrieval.
